title: President condoles over deaths in Diamer bus accident
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 7 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Tuesday condoled over the loss of life in a bus accident that took place in Diamer district of Gilgit Baltistan.
The president expressed grief over the deaths in the tragic incident and sympathised with the bereaved families.
He also prayed to Allah Almighty for peace of the departed souls and early recovery of the injured.
